nodes.text: At some point during the Clone Wars, Chancellor Palpatine sent Rorworr, Vor'en Kurn, Deel Surool, and Sia-Lan Wezz to investigate rumors of a Sith temple on the small, snow-covered planet of Puloorn. Although surveys showed no signs of habitation, the team found the temple ruins, possibly inhabited by Dark side beasts or cultists, and reported the findings to Palpatine and the Jedi Council.
